services:
  caddy:
    image: caddy
    container_name: caddy
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "443:443"
    volumes:
      - ./conf:/etc/caddy
      - caddy_data:/data
      - caddy_config:/config
  sub-store:
    image: xream/sub-store
    container_name: sub-store
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
       - ./data:/opt/app/data
    environment:
      SUB_STORE_FRONTEND_BACKEND_PATH: "/MHxrd3DfOBGU319E5C53" # è¿™é‡Œæ”¹æˆä½ è‡ªå·±çš„éšæœºè·¯å¾„
      SUB_STORE_CRON: "55 23 * * *"
volumes:
  caddy_data:
  caddy_config:
